text: Itte yaru ga ī. `Watashi wa omo kara no meishō no ue ni (tatsu monode) aru ga, anata gata wa sore o kyogidearu to shita. Anata gata ga isogu koto (chōbatsu) wa, watashi ni dekiru kotode wanai. Saiketsu wa arrā ni dake zokusuru. Kare wa shinjitsu o toka re, mottomo sugureta saiketsu-sha de ara reru
